short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight google ads so they stand out from real content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension highlights Google ads with a light blue background, so they stand out from actual content. Optionally, you can set the extension to hide ads by clicking on the extension icon in then toolbar and switching Hide Ads to on.
*Note*: the extension will only work while viewing a Google search result.
